news.content:
Good day, all! ☀️

For those who missed the Ask Me Anything on Tuesday evening, you can find the call recording here.

Included in the description of the video are:

1. the timestamps, for easy call navigation & 2. the presentation that was used during the call.

With any further questions, please head to our forum. Thanks!
news.excerpt: For those who missed the Ask Me Anything on Tuesday evening, you can find the call recording within!

previous.title: 3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect
previous.excerpt: As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.

next.title: Dash & Dash NEXT partners with ThreeFold
next.excerpt: Dash, Dash NEXT and the ThreeFold Foundation are excited to officially announce their collaboration, effective the end of June 2020.
